## Test plot_all_day_routes
Here we plot temperature at the time og the walk.  Note weather data was not recorded until the middle of the 2020.  

```{r plot_all Temperatures}

weather <- 
    all_day_routes %>% 
        filter( !is.na(temp)) %>% 
            mutate( date = as_date( date_time )) %>% 
                select( id,
                        date_time,
                        date,
                        temp:walking_conditions )

weather %>% 
    ggplot( aes( x = date, y = temp)) +
        geom_line() +
        xlab( "Date" ) +
        ylab( "Temperature (degrees Fahrenheit)" ) +
        ggtitle("Temperature at time of walk" ) +
        theme_cowplot()

```
